allow: Bash(docker exec open-webui sh -c "curl -s --max-time 3 http://ollama:11434/api/tags | head -c 100")
Bash(docker exec devops-tools-backend sh -c "curl -s --max-time 3 http://gitlab-server/api/v4/projects 2>/dev/null | head -c 50")

Bash(docker exec devops-tools-backend sh -c '
echo -n ""GitLab......... ""; curl -s --max-time 3 http://gitlab-server/api/v4/version && echo "" ✓"" || echo "" ✗""
echo -n ""SonarQube...... ""; curl -s --max-time 3 http://ai-sonarqube:9000/api/system/status | head -c 30 && echo "" ✓"" || echo "" ✗""
echo -n ""Nexus.......... ""; curl -s --max-time 3 http://ai-nexus:8081/service/rest/v1/status | head -c 30 && echo "" ✓"" || echo "" ✗""
echo -n ""Trivy.......... ""; curl -s --max-time 3 http://trivy-server:8080/healthz && echo "" ✓"" || echo "" ✗""
echo -n ""Ollama......... ""; curl -s --max-time 3 http://ollama:11434/ && echo "" ✓"" || echo "" ✗""
echo -n ""ChromaDB....... ""; curl -s --max-time 3 http://chromadb:8000/api/v1/heartbeat && echo "" ✓"" || echo "" ✗""
echo -n ""Redis.......... ""; nc -zv redis 6379 2>&1 | grep -q succeeded && echo ""✓"" || echo ""✗""
echo -n ""PostgreSQL..... ""; nc -zv ai-postgres 5432 2>&1 | grep -q succeeded && echo ""✓"" || echo ""✗""
echo -n ""MinIO.......... ""; curl -s --max-time 3 http://minio:9000/minio/health/live && echo "" ✓"" || echo "" ✗""
echo -n ""Prometheus..... ""; curl -s --max-time 3 http://prometheus:9090/-/healthy && echo "" ✓"" || echo "" ✗""
echo -n ""Grafana........ ""; curl -s --max-time 3 http://grafana:3000/api/health | head -c 30 && echo "" ✓"" || echo "" ✗""
echo -n ""Loki........... ""; curl -s --max-time 3 http://loki:3100/ready | head -c 20 && echo "" ✓"" || echo "" ✗""
echo -n ""Jaeger......... ""; curl -s --max-time 3 http://jaeger:16686/ | head -c 20 && echo "" ✓"" || echo "" ✗""
')

Bash(docker exec devops-tools-backend sh -c '
for host in gitlab-server ai-sonarqube ai-nexus trivy-server ollama chromadb redis ai-postgres minio prometheus grafana loki jaeger; do
  ip=$\(getent hosts $host 2>/dev/null | awk ""{print \\$1}""\)
  if [ -n ""$ip"" ]; then
    echo ""$host → $ip ✓""
  else
    echo ""$host → NOT RESOLVED ✗""
  fi
done
')
